name: Chain Gun
description:
CONTROLS Move LeftMove RightDashAttackRestartMute musicADSpace + MoveLeft clickRM THIS GAME IS HARD 

A short game made for a 10 day game jam (Keep your distance) where you try to break free from the boss's chain hook all the while dodging and weaving his attacks

You can defeat the boss without taking a single hit.

Hint: Dodge trough bullets to heal, good luck!

Music -> Kevin MacLeod - Ready Aim Fire
